text: We're about to go on a hike to Usge Ban falls.

So the hike to the falls is pretty easy
it's just a one kilometre hike on a very

simple trail but I hear it's gorgeous
once you get there

So this is really a beautiful hike. One
thing that I'm really loving are all of

the trees that are growing out of the
rocks their roots are completely exposed
Ah, and there's even scenic rest stops along the way
So you can totally take your time
